text: Oschatz is a town in Nordsachsen, in Saxony, Germany. It is 60 km east of Leipzig and 60 km west of Dresden. == Subdistricts == Oschatz contains the following 14 districts: * Kleinforst * Altoschatz * Fliegerhorst * Leuben * Limbach * Lonnewitz * Mannschatz * Merkwitz * Rechau * Schmorkau * Striesa * Thalheim (with Saalhausen and Kreischa) * Zöschau * Zschöllau == References == Category:Nordsachsen
title: Oschatz
